moves.name: Rage
moves.description: As long as this move is in use, the power of rage raises the Attack stat each time the user is hit in battle.

moves.name: Defense Curl
moves.description: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.

moves.name: Rollout
moves.description: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes stronger each time it hits.

moves.name: Spite
moves.description: The user unleashes its grudge on the move last used by the target by cutting 4 PP from it.

moves.name: Pursuit
moves.description: An attack move that inflicts double damage if used on a target that is switching out of battle.

moves.name: Screech
moves.description: An earsplitting screech harshly reduces the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Yawn
moves.description: The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the target into falling asleep on the next turn.

moves.name: Ancient Power
moves.description: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. It may also raise all the user's stats at once.

moves.name: Take Down
moves.description: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. It also damages the user a little.

moves.name: Roost
moves.description: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user's HP by up to half of its max HP.

moves.name: Glare
moves.description: The user intimidates the target with the pattern on its belly to cause paralysis.

moves.name: Dig
moves.description: The user burrows, then attacks on the second turn. It can also be used to exit dungeons.

moves.name: Double-Edge
moves.description: A reckless, life-risking tackle. It also damages the user by a fairly large amount, however.

moves.name: Coil
moves.description: The user coils up and concentrates. This raises its Attack and Defense stats as well as its accuracy.

moves.name: Endure
moves.description: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: Drill Run
moves.description: The user crashes into its target while rotating its body like a drill. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Endeavor
moves.description: An attack move that cuts down the target's HP to equal the user's HP.

moves.name: Flail
moves.description: The user flails about aimlessly to attack. It becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.
